Notes: Exhibits include the "History of Colored Carnival" that details the African American contribution to Mardi Gras.  The "Slavery Artifacts" exhibit features authentic displays of shackles, leg irons, slave collars, and slave bracelets from antebellum Alabama.  The museum also collects artifacts representing the contributions African Americans have made to greater Mobile.
Name Notes: Formally the Davis Avenue Branch of the Mobile Public Library
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
